basics.name: Aaron Collins
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: I have 20 years of experience in programming, security and C.I.C.D. automation.  I spent the last 10 years automating large scale cloud infrastructures.  Iâ€™ve mastered several configuration as code methods to accomplish stable highly available networks. I really enjoy creating automated tools for reducing the push, test deploy feedback loop with automated monitoring and notifications.

work.summary: Responsible for implementing software defined infrastructure, training Jr. engineers and researching new infrastructure goals.  Developed automated jobs to deploy code and manage infrastructure. Additionally helped marketing team implement highly available blog platform and engineering team debug performance issues.
highlights: Developed identity management solution to grant access to 1k developers across 2500 hosts
Developed automated monitoring and provisioning system to aid in auto-scale
Created and managed docker clusters via Spotinst and ECS to lead effort in moving from virtual servers to containers
Created base images and deployment tools to deploy new applications to containers

education.area: CompTIA Security+ meets the ISO 17024 standard and is approved by U.S. Department of Defense to fulfill Directive 8570.01-M requirements. Technology
